events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering team for the Software Developer role based on your resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to your case and will contact you soon for the next steps.
We completed your initial screening call where we discussed your experience in software development and technical skills.
Thank you for your prompt response providing additional details about your project experience and coding skills.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC with our lead developer.
